text: Greta Scacchi (born 18 February 1960) is an Italian-Australian actress. She acts mostly in movies, although sometimes in television programs. She starred in lots of movies, which include White Mischief and Presumed Innocent. She has acted in many other movies as well. Scacchi was born Greta Scacchi in Milan to an English mother and Italian father. Since 1995, she is an Australian citizen, and is still an Italian citizen. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Milan Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia
title: Greta Scacchi
